title: As COVID-19 wave begins to flatten in India, new deadly illness poses a challenge
content:
1. As COVID-19 wave begins to flatten in India, new deadly illness poses a challenge  CBS News
  2. Black fungus epidemic amid pandemic: Symptoms, dos & don'ts, prevention  Business Standard
  3. In the Wake of India’s Covid Crisis, a ‘Black Fungus’ Epidemic Follows  The New York Times
  4. Tens of thousands of COVID-19 survivors in India are developing deadly 'black fungus' infections that can lead to blindness  Yahoo News
  5. India's "black fungus" infections exacerbated by crowded hospitals, lack of oxygen  Axios
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
